long_description: The Patagonia All-Wear cargo shorts will get you through your summer work projects and afternoon lounge sessions. Made from lightweight organic cotton canvas for breathable comfort and easy care; fabric softens with each washing. 2 wide-entry hand pockets, 2 bellowed cargo pockets and 2 rear flap pockets hold your essentials. Shorts include a zippered fly with button closure. The Patagonia All-Wear cargo shorts have a regular fit that's not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The Patagonia All-Wear cargo shorts will get you through your summer work projects and afternoon lounge sessions.
